TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 建立管理组件的 对象集合的设计时服务。

span.span: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of objects for components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责管理集合在设计时存在窗体的组件的每个实例的对象。The class is responsible for managing the collection of objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time. 此类提供了直接推送模型项创建的并主要用于通过设计时工具开发人员，但它还可以使用的组件和自定义控件开发人员。This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers. 设计时工具开发人员将需要确定要显示的组件和确定何时更改此列表项的列表。Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes. 他们还可能与智能标记面板对象结合使用来创建操作的外接程序。They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects. 高级开发人员可能需要动态控制的项关联的组件，从而替换或补充标准拉取模式的组件。Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model. 例如，可以根据其使用和组件的设计时状态的上下文更改面板命令。For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component. > [!NOTE] > 实际上是驱动服务后面推送和拉取模型; 但是，在它的隐式操作后一种情况。The is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly. 用于访问和操作对于每个组件，包括以下方法和事件的项提供一个简单接口： provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - 方法确定是否当前正在管理特定组件。The method determines whether the is currently managing a particular component. - 方法支持的项列表的枚举。The method supports the enumeration of the lists of items. - 方法允许将添加或到组件实例的现有项集。The method allows adding a or to the set of existing items for a component instance. 与此相反，方法中删除一个或多个与组件关联的项列表。In contrast, the method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component. > [!NOTE] > 方法表示将控制面板项与组件相关联的直推技术模型。The method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component. 与此相反，请求模型依赖于重写为该组件的设计器类的属性。In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the property of the designer class for that component. 在设计环境负责将这些项添加到当前设计图面上创建一个组件时。The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current when a component is created on the design surface. > [!IMPORTANT] > ， ， ，和方法只考虑，或会影响推送模型项。The , , , and methods only consider or affect push-model items. - 事件指示当组件更改的项的集合。The event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component. 因为它通常需要将一些组件的设计时快捷菜单和其面板中相同的控制面板项，之间存在很大程度的互操作性对象和设计器谓词。Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between objects and designer verbs. 如果组件设计器不显式指定(即，它不包含被重写属性)，则列表将创建从现有的设计器谓词。If a component designer does not explicitly specify a (that is, it does not contain an overridden property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs. 指定这些谓词属性。These verbs are specified by the property. 在这种情况下，内部的谓词列表类用于放置的谓词项面板项的集合。In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries. 如果你想用于同时用作面板条目和设计时快捷菜单项，则可以设置`includeAsDesignerVerb`该项的构造函数中的参数。If you want a to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor. 使用以控制您的设计器的显示。Use the to control the display of your designer's .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 当前设计时环境的服务提供程序。

span.span: The service provider for the current design-time environment.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务提供程序是必需的监视所选内容和组件的更改。A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes. 它应支持和类型。It is expected to support the and types. 类使用内部表来管理组件和其关联智能标记。The class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated smart tags. 通常情况下，组件开发人员不需要创建此类; 的实例相反，它们能够获取现有实例通过调用方法。Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the method.

summary.span: 将一个或多个 对象添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds one or more objects to the current collection of managed smart tags.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList actionList) cil managed
Public Sub Add (comp As IComponent, actionList As DesignerActionList)

span.span: The to associate the smart tags with.

param.name: actionList
param.span: 包含要添加的新智能标记项的 。

span.span: The that contains the new smart tag items to be added.

summary.span: 将 添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds a to the current collection of managed smart tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示添加智能标记项推送模型。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 备用请求模型依赖于重写相应组件的设计器中的属性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 当调用此方法时，扫描要添加的列表中是否有任何与属性设置为`true`。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 这些项添加到此组件，通过调用的设计器谓词的列表方法。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 在组件实例的基础上管理智能标记。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 托管的集合可能包含重复条目。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event.

exception.span: 两个参数之一或两个参数均为 。

summary.span: 将 添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示添加智能标记项推送模型。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 备用请求模型依赖于重写相应组件的设计器中的属性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 当调用此方法时，扫描要添加的列表中是否有任何与属性设置为`true`。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 这些项添加到此组件，通过调用的设计器谓词的列表方法。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 在组件实例的基础上管理智能标记。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 托管的集合可能包含重复条目。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 解除所有组件的管理，并清除所有推模型智能标记列表。

span.span: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可清空内部表用于存储有关的组件和其推送模型智能标记列表的信息。The method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists. > [!CAUTION] > 由于此方法会影响由当前的服务管理的所有组件，而不仅仅是当前的组件，则应谨慎地使用此方法。Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously. 通常情况下，设计时工具开发人员使用它时重置设计图面。Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface. 组件开发人员应使用一种方法改为删除单个智能标记项或列出。Component developers should use one of the methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists. A每个组件的以前由当前的服务引发事件。A event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp) cil managed
Public Function Contains (comp As IComponent) As Boolean

span.span: The to search for.

summary.span: 确定当前智能标记服务是否管理指定组件的操作列表。

returns.span: 如果组件由当前服务管理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法只识别推送模型智能标记，与具有的组件相关联方法。The method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the method. 尽管没有结构限制的并发数量设计时工具创建的实例，通常只能运行一个服务实例创建每个设计图面。Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DesignerActionListsChanged As DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 为任何组件移除或添加 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is removed or added for any component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示与关联的专用类的一套事件。The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the event. |专用的类型Specialized type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||将特定的信息添加到智能标记列表管理。Adds information specific to smart tag list management. 此类从专用。This class is specialized from .| ||连接与其处理程序。Connects the with its handler.| ||表示是否已添加或删除列表。Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是由规定的唯一方法的实现接口。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它执行两个主要操作：It performs two main actions: - 从通过调用在设计环境中的可用服务列表中删除当前服务方法。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 向从关联的组件更改事件取消订阅接口。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是由规定的唯一方法的实现接口。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它执行两个主要操作：It performs two main actions: - 从通过调用在设计环境中的可用服务列表中删除当前服务方法。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 向从关联的组件更改事件取消订阅接口。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 返回与某个组件关联的智能标记项列表的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.

summary.span: 返回与某个组件关联的智能标记项列表的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.

returns.span: 指定组件的智能标记集合。

span.span: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于调用方法使用`type`参数。The method is equivalent to a call to the method using a `type` parameter of . 因此，返回的集合将包含推送和拉取智能标记列表。Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags. 返回是通过添加的项列表的并集方法以及列表从获取从组件的网站获取的实例。The returned is the union of item lists added through the methods and also the lists obtained from the instance obtained from the component’s site.

span.span: is .

returns.span: 指定组件的指定类型的智能标记集合。

span.span: The collection of smart tags of the specified type for the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载方法筛选`type`参数，它可以具有以下值之一。This version of the overloaded method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||所有关联的智能标记。All associated smart tags.| ||仅限拉出模型智能标记。Pull-model smart tags only.| ||仅限推送模型智能标记。Push-model smart tags only.| 如果关联的设计器中为组件未提供的拉出模型智能标记列表中，则方法将改为使用设计器的设计时快捷菜单项从属性。If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是为帮助器方法方法。The method is a helper method for the methods. 搜索拉出模型智能标记的类型，然后将它们添加到所提供`actionLists`集合。 searches for pull-model smart tags of type , and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection. 如果组件的开发人员未显式提供通过智能标记的集合及其设计器的属性，此方法将重复使用的设计时快捷菜单项，通过获取属性设计器。If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the property of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法通常由设计工具开发人员，因为组件开发人员通常不知道哪些其他组件存在于当前设计空间。This version of the method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space. 如果成功，此方法将引发事件。If successful, this method raises the event.
